item.description:
Let's do something fun to bring in the spring! Perhaps a local watering hole...doesn't matter where or what we do....let's do it all together!

Tired of doing the same old thing or nothing at all...start the week off with a bang! Looking to meet new friends and maybe even that special person....I'm game for anything!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: 40's...Let's Get Together and have Fun! June Meetup
